channel.title: Whonix 16.0.5.3 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Whonix for VirtualBox
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes
* updated [deb.torproject.org](http://deb.torproject.org/) signing key → [Tor integration in Whonix - #23 by Patrick](https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-integration-in-whonix/10593/23) * `tor` `0.4.7.8` security fix → [Tor integration in Whonix - #24 by Patrick](https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-integration-in-whonix/10593/24) * Tor Browser `11.0.14` → [Tor Browser Integration - #15 by Patrick](https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-browser-integration/11912/15) * Removed all unicode from project source code in preparation for future automated safeguards for https://forums.whonix.org/t/detecting-malicious-unicode-in-source-code-and-pull-requests/13754.
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Stable_Release
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stable_Release
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/derivative-maker/derivative-maker/compare/16.0.5.0-developers-only...16.0.5.3-developers-only

item.title: Whonix 16.0.5.3 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Kicksecure – 24 Mar 22

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • updated deb.torproject.org signing key → Tor integration in Whonix - #23 by Patrick
  • tor 0.4.7.8 security fix → Tor integration in Whonix - #24 by Patrick
  • Tor Browser 11.0.14 → Tor Browser Integration - #15 by Patrick
  • Removed all unicode from project source code in preparation for future automated safeguards for Detecting Malicious Unicode in Source Code and Pull Requests.

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 15 Mar 22

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 5 Jun 22

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

Kicksecure – 5 Jun 22

Stable Release

Kicksecure ™ Release Notes, Changelog, Kicksecure ™ 16 Stable Release

Whonix – 16 Jun 22

Stable Release

Whonix ™ Release Notes, Changelog, Whonix ™ 16 Stable Release

Full difference of all changes
